TopicTitle: How do I recover a ship?

Articles.Content:
I found a handy mod (below) that allows you to deploy payloads to a specific orbit automatically once you've done it once. Now I wanna expand it to be able to recover ships. I've checked the Vessel class and it does not have a recover() method, just a IsRecoverable property that gets whether the vessel can be recovered. 

So how should I recover the ship? Maybe land it on the runway so that I can pick it up from space center, that'll work too. If that's the way to do it how would I get the coordinates of the runway?
Put your cursor up to the altitude meter (the thing with the numbers) and press the green button that says "RECOVER VESSEL."
